DeleteAdvanceConfig.title: DeleteAdvanceConfig
DeleteAdvanceConfig.summary: Deletes the details about advanced configurations.

DeleteIndexVersion.title: DeleteIndexVersion
DeleteIndexVersion.summary: Deletes the version of an index.

GetAdvanceConfig.title: GetAdvanceConfig
GetAdvanceConfig.summary: Queries the information about an advanced configuration.

GetAdvanceConfigFile.title: GetAdvanceConfigFile
GetAdvanceConfigFile.summary: Queries the information about an advanced configuration file.

GetCluster.title: GetCluster
GetCluster.summary: Queries the details of a cluster.

GetClusterRunTimeInfo.title: GetClusterRunTimeInfo
GetClusterRunTimeInfo.summary: Queries the runtime information about a specified cluster.

GetDatabaseSchema.title: GetDatabaseSchema
GetDatabaseSchema.summary: Queries the schema of a database.

GetDeployGraph.title: GetDeployGraph
GetDeployGraph.summary: Displays the overview of the deployment.

GetFile.title: GetFile
GetFile.summary: Queries the details of an index table version.

GetIndex.title: GetIndex
GetIndex.summary: Queries the information about an index version.

GetIndexOnlineStrategy.title: GetIndexOnlineStrategy
GetIndexOnlineStrategy.summary: Queries the online effective policy of an index.

GetIndexVersion.title: GetIndexVersion
GetIndexVersion.summary: Queries the information about index versions that the current index version can be rolled back to.

GetInstance.title: GetInstance
GetInstance.summary: Queries the details of an instance based on the instance ID.

GetNodeConfig.title: GetNodeConfig
GetNodeConfig.summary: Gets the configuration information of a node.

GetSqlInstance.title: GetSqlInstance
GetSqlInstance.summary: Queries the information about an SQL instance.

GetTable.title: GetTable
GetTable.summary: Queries the information about an index table.

GetTableGeneration.title: GetTableGeneration
GetTableGeneration.summary: Queries the status of an index version based on the ID of the full index version.

ListAdvanceConfigDir.title: ListAdvanceConfigDir
ListAdvanceConfigDir.summary: Queries the files in an advanced configuration directory.

ListAdvanceConfigs.title: ListAdvanceConfigs
ListAdvanceConfigs.summary: Obtains a list of advanced configurations.

ListDataSourceSchemas.title: ListDataSourceSchemas
ListDataSourceSchemas.summary: Queries the schema information about a data source.

ListDataSources.title: ListDataSources
ListDataSources.summary: Obtains the list of data sources.

ListDateSourceGenerations.title: ListDateSourceGenerations
ListDateSourceGenerations.summary: Queries the historical index versions of a data source.

ListInstanceSpecs.title: ListInstanceSpecs
ListInstanceSpecs.summary: Queries the specifications of an instance.

ListOnlineConfigs.title: ListOnlineConfigs
ListOnlineConfigs.summary: Queries the details of an online configuration.

ListTableGenerations.title: ListTableGenerations
ListTableGenerations.summary: Queries a list of index versions.

ListTables.title: ListTables
ListTables.summary: Queries a list of index tables.

ModifyClusterDesc.title: ModifyClusterDesc
ModifyClusterDesc.summary: Modifies the description of a specified cluster.

ModifyClusterOfflineConfig.title: ModifyClusterOfflineConfig
ModifyClusterOfflineConfig.summary: Modifies the configuration information of a cluster.

ModifyClusterOnlineConfig.title: ModifyClusterOnlineConfig
ModifyClusterOnlineConfig.summary: Modifies the online configuration of a cluster.

ModifyIndexOnlineStrategy.title: ModifyIndexOnlineStrategy
ModifyIndexOnlineStrategy.summary: Modifies the online policy of an index.

ModifyIndexPartition.title: ModifyIndexPartition
ModifyIndexPartition.summary: Modifies the information about index partitions.

ModifyIndexVersion.title: ModifyIndexVersion
ModifyIndexVersion.summary: Modifies the index version of a cluster (an index version rollback).

ModifyNodeConfig.title: ModifyNodeConfig
ModifyNodeConfig.summary: Modifies the configurations of a node.

ModifyPassword.title: ModifyPassword
ModifyPassword.summary: Changes the password of an instance.

PublishAdvanceConfig.title: PublishAdvanceConfig
PublishAdvanceConfig.summary: Publishes a version of advanced configurations.

RenameFolder.title: RenameFolder
RenameFolder.summary: Modifies the name of a folder.

UpdateInstance.title: UpdateInstance
UpdateInstance.summary: Modifies the configuration of a specified instance.

UpdateSqlInstanceContent.title: UpdateSqlInstanceContent
UpdateSqlInstanceContent.summary: Modifies the content of an SQL instance.

UpdateSqlInstanceName.title: UpdateSqlInstanceName
UpdateSqlInstanceName.summary: Modifies the name of an SQL instance.

UpdateSqlInstanceParams.title: UpdateSqlInstanceParams
UpdateSqlInstanceParams.summary: Modifies the parameters of an SQL instance.
